summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan in the sum of $500,000 and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds therefor in said sum, in lieu of a like amount authorized by Ordinance No. 58542, for the purpose of providing funds for aiding in acquiring and constructing highway approaches to the Aurora Avenue Bridge, as submitted to the qualified electors (voters) under Ordinance No. 60610; providing for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest of said bonds, etc.
